name: mopnss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c2, c1))

stmt.origin: sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3), wss(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
stmt.pretty: sylan(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), c2 ∈ c3, c2 ⊆ c1, c3 ∈(TopOn ` c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c2, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c2, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c2, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c2, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c2, c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c0))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c3, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c2, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c2, c1))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c3)→ c2 ⊆ c1)
⊣ c3 =(MetOpen ` c0)

comment: An open set of a metric space is a subspace of its base set. (Contributed by NM, 3-Sep-2006.)
